profile_summary:
As a skilled Software Developer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **.NET**, **C#**, and **MS SQL Server** to drive the development of high-performance applications, particularly within the healthcare and financial sectors. My proficiency in **T-SQL**, **Angular**, and **CSS** enables me to create intuitive user interfaces and effective web services while adhering to best practices in **REST APIs** and service-oriented architecture.
Furthermore, I possess extensive experience with cloud technologies, particularly **Azure**, and maintain a strong focus on **CI/CD** and **DevOps** methodologies to streamline development processes. My technical toolbox includes modern frameworks and tools such as **JavaScript**, **Visual Studio**, and design patterns aimed at producing scalable and maintainable software solutions.
In addition, I have a proven track record in building applications compliant with industry standards, effectively integrating my foundational knowledge in microservices architecture and automation practices.
